copy: Shy ex-Princess of the Beastman Tribe

descriptions.mainCopy:
Grrreetings! 
I'm Regrush Lionheart, a member of NoriPro Gamers! 
I'll be counting on you!
descriptions.subDescription:
A former princess of the royal Lionheart family who ran away 
from her home in the human world 
from a different world inhabited by beastmen. 
She wants to make many friends through VTuber activities 
and fix her introverted personality.
